description: Sam is thrilled about the control he gets over the different image sizes! Just for the fun of it, he tries to write the media query in other ways. Can you help Sam figure out how to achive the same result using (max-width) instead?
todo: Rewrite the sizes attribute so it's using max-width instead of min-width.

correct.headline: Good job!
correct.text: Was it a bit tricky? Sam thinks media queries can be hard to wrap his head around sometimes, but he's lucky to have a friend like you!

wrong.headline: Media queries can be hard...
